name: The Infinite Bomber
description: This is a casual, scrolling airplane game.  Enter enemy airspace and take out their factories.  Hopefully you'll find this game, in the classic description, "easy to learn and difficult to master."  Help me decide the fate of this game, by commenting or supporting it.  There are so many things that could be added to this game and so many directions...but I hope that you'll enjoy it just how it is.
